c19mcpnt.description: Online/mobile communication with parent, how often compared with before COVID-19
c19mcpnt.question: Compared with before the coronavirus pandemic, would you say that you have online or mobile communication with {him/her}...

livpnt.question: Are any of your parents still alive?

pntmofa.description: Parents still alive, mother or father
pntmofa.question: Now please think of your parent who had his or her birthday most recently. Is this your mother or your father?

hhlipnt.question: Does your parent live in the same household as you?

closepnt.question: Taking everything into consideration, how close do you feel to your parent?

ttminpnt.description: Travel time to parent, in minutes
ttminpnt.question: About how long would it take you to get to where your parent lives, on average?

speakpnt.description: Speak with parent in person, how often
speakpnt.question: How often do you speak with your parent in person?

scrnpnt.description: Speak with parent and see each other on a screen, how often
scrnpnt.question: How often do you speak with your parent such that you can see each other on a screen?

phonepnt.description: Speak with parent using a phone, how often
phonepnt.question: How often do you speak with your parent using a phone or other device?

compnt.description: Communicate with parent via text, email or messaging apps, how often
compnt.question: How often do you and your parent communicate with each other via text, email or messaging apps?

c19sppnt.description: Speak with parent in person, how often compared with before COVID-19
c19sppnt.question: Compared with before the coronavirus pandemic, would you say that you speak with your parent in person...

values.55: We are never in the same location now due to the pandemic

c19mcpnt.description: Online/mobile communication with parent, how often compared with before COVID-19
c19mcpnt.question: Compared with before the coronavirus pandemic, would you say that you have online or mobile communication with {him/her}...

stfmjob.description: How satisfied are you in your main job
stfmjob.question: How satisfied are you in your main job?

trdawrk.description: Too tired after work to enjoy things like doing at home, how often
trdawrk.question: How often do you feel too tired after work to enjoy the things you would like to do at home?

jbprtfp.description: Job prevents you from giving time to partner/family, how often
jbprtfp.question: How often do you find that your job prevents you from giving the time you want to your partner or family?

pfmfdjba.description: Partner/family fed up with pressure of your job, how often
pfmfdjba.question: How often do you find that your partner or family gets fed up with the pressure of your job?

dcsfwrka.description: Current job: can decide time start/finish work
dcsfwrka.question: To what extent are you allowed to decide your own starting and finishing times at work?

wrkhome.description: Work from home or place of choice, how often
wrkhome.question: How often do you work from home or from another place of your choice during your regular working hours?

dcsfwrka.description: Current job: can decide time start/finish work
dcsfwrka.question: To what extent are you allowed to decide your own starting and finishing times at work?

wrkhome.description: Work from home or place of choice, how often
wrkhome.question: How often do you work from home or from another place of your choice during your regular working hours?

c19whome.description: Work from home or place of choice, how often compared with before COVID-19
c19whome.question: Compared with before the coronavirus pandemic, would you say that you work from home or from another place of your choice...

values.55: I cannot work from home or another place of my choice

c19wplch.description: Work place change occurred as a result of COVID-19
c19wplch.question: Would you say that this change occurred as a result of the coronavirus pandemic?

wrklong.description: Employees expected to work overtime, how often
wrklong.question: How often are employees in your organisation expected to work overtime, whether at the workplace or at home?

values.55: I don't work in an organisation

wrkresp.description: Employees expected to be responsive outside working hours, how often
wrkresp.question: How often are employees in your organisation expected to be responsive to work communications outside working hours?

c19whacc.description: Work from home or place of choice, how accepted compared with before COVID-19
c19whacc.question: Compared with before the coronavirus pandemic, how accepted is it for employees in your organisation to choose to work regularly from home or from another place of their choice nowadays?

values.33: Employees need to work from home due to coronavirus restrictions
values.44: Employees in my organisation do not have a regular workplace
values.55: Employees in my organisation do not work regularly from home or from another place of their choice

mansupp.description: Line manager supports employees in balancing work, how much
mansupp.question: If you have a line manager, how much does he or she support employees in balancing work and personal commitments?

values.55: I don't have a line manager

manhlp.description: Line manager gives work-related help, how likely
manhlp.question: How likely would your line manager be to give you work-related help or advice, if needed?

manwrkpl.description: Line manager and respondent are at the same workplace, how often
manwrkpl.question: How often are you and your line manager at the same workplace at the same time?

values.44: I don't have a regular workplace

manspeak.description: Speak with line manager about work in person, how often
manspeak.question: How often do you speak about work with your line manager in person? Please only include occasions where you are physically in the same location.

manscrn.description: Speak with line manager about work and see each other on a screen, how often
manscrn.question: How often do you speak about work with your line manager such that you can see each other on a screen?

manphone.description: Speak with line about work manager using a phone, how often
manphone.question: How often do you speak about work with your line manager using a phone or other device? Please include calls you make or receive, but exclude calls where you see each other on a screen.

mancom.description: Communicate with line manager about work via text, email or messaging apps, how often
mancom.question: How often do you communicate about work in writing with your line manager via text, email or messaging apps?

teamfeel.description: Feel like part of your team, how much
teamfeel.question: If you work in a team, how much do you feel like part of your team?

values.55: I don't work in a team

wrkextra.description: Take on extra responsibilities at work without being paid more
wrkextra.question: If needed, how willing would you be to take on extra responsibilities at work without being paid more?

colhlp.question: How likely would your colleagues be to give you work-related help or advice, if needed?

colspeak.question: How often do you speak about work with your colleagues in person? Please only include occasions where you are physically in the same location.

colscrn.question: How often do you speak about work with your colleagues such that you can see each other on a screen?

colphone.question: How often do you speak about work with your colleagues using a phone or other device? Please include calls you make or receive, but exclude calls where you see each other on a screen.

colcom.description: Communicate with colleagues about work via text, email or messaging apps, how often
colcom.question: How often do you communicate about work in writing with your colleagues via text, email or messaging apps?

c19spwrk.question: Compared with before the coronavirus pandemic, would you say that you speak with people you work with in person...

values.55: We are never in the same location now due to the pandemic

c19mcwrk.question: Compared with before the coronavirus pandemic, would you say that you have online or mobile communication with the people you work with...
